programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: This heart-warming festive TV movie centres on 10-year-old Mikey, whose humble background has left him feeling cynical about Santa and Christmas in general.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Weekend at Bunny's Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. Grimly Day It's Grimly Day?the grimmest day of the year!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!

And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a “family fairy” means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ton-Ton's dreams come true when the Trux build hang-gliding wings to rescue the Ottos, but when he crashes it's up to Dozer to fly the rescue mission

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Weekend at Bunny's Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. Grimly Day It's Grimly Day?the grimmest day of the year!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her family’s quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.desc: In the aftermath of Cobra Kai’s win at the Under 18 All Valley Karate Championships, Johnny questions his dojo’s philosophy and deals with a figure from his past. Daniel searches for the right way to respond to Cobra Kai’s dominance.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands
programme.desc: Andrea finds himself in trouble for the accuses of falsifying data from a pharmaceutical trial: unable to defend himself due to his amnesia, he seeks confirmation from people close to him. Agnese has a sudden illness.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands
programme.desc: Agnese's condition rapidly deteriorates and Andrea receives the support of the whole ward to discover what's happening. The accusations against him about the falsification of data on pharmaceutical trials jeopardize his career.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water (S8)
programme.desc: On a resupply mission, Wes goes missing after a life-threatening fall from the airboat into the raging 36°F river, and the crew fears the worst.

programme.title: Holmes Family Rescue (S1)
programme.desc: Mike, Michael and Sherry answer a woman's distress call after a dodgy contractor botched the repairs in her flooded basement.

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold (S1)
programme.desc: It's Jack Hoffman's birthday but if they want to reach their season goal there's no time for cake.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid XL (S5)
programme.desc: Scorching heat punishes Suzanne as she goes it alone. Plus, a potential snake attack could be Seth’s first African food win and Bulent takes on a lizard.

programme.title: Exploring The Unknown With Wang Yibo (S1)
programme.desc: Relying on the desert movement and survival skills taught by experts, Wang Yibo goes to Birutu Peak in the Badain Jaran Desert in Inner Mongolia to watch the sunrise.

programme.title: Into The Jungle With Ed Stafford (S1)
programme.desc: Explorer and former British Army captain Ed Stafford sets up an extreme survival school that will put struggling modern dads and their children.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford (S3)
programme.desc: Stuck in nearly two metres of powder, Ed must work out how to survive long enough to make his way off the peak of Changbai Mountain in Northern China.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water (S7)
programme.desc: A mysterious white boulder dubbed "Moby" could be the gateway to more monster nuggets.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue (S5)
programme.desc: The Raneys answer an urgent call from central Alaska, where they find a family with all the infrastructure but minimal skills to realize their dream.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid XL (S5)
programme.desc: Wes scores another kill, but when a large group enters their camp, tensions flare. Bulent migrates to Seth’s watering hole, will the two join forces?

programme.desc: Tigre and René face the extreme dangers of the mountains of Vetas, a region in northern Colombia where the terrain is rugged and hostile.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid (S11)
programme.desc: Four survivalists try to endure 21 days in the ancient Mayan jungle, where humans were once sacrificed to the gods. Now they face mosquitos and wasps.

programme.title: Into The Jungle With Ed Stafford (S1)
programme.desc: Ed follows in the footsteps of the ancient Mayans as they camp in the jungle overnight. As a reward, Ed has a surprise for each family at sunrise.

programme.desc: Adventurous teams of two compete in the ultimate survival test!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. programme.title: Yorme: The Isko Domagoso Story
programme.desc: Isko Moreno, a once lowly garbage collector who became an actor and now a government servant who dreams for a better life for every Filipino.

programme.title: Alas-Dose
programme.desc: A mad bomber is on the loose and the bomb squad leader Col. Titus Varona (Cesar Montano) is at his wits' end.

programme.title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
programme.desc: Joselito (Aga Muhlach), an intellectually-disabled man, is wrongfully charged assault and murder. In prison he becomes friends with his fellow inmates and together they form a plan to see his young daughter (Xia Vigor) inside the cell. Years after, his daughter (Bela Padilla) becomes a lawyer and is determined to prove her father's innocence.

programme.title: Sid & Aya (Not A Love Story)
programme.desc: It follows Sid (Dingdong Dantes) who suffers from insomnia and meets Aya (Anne Curtis) who he hires to accompany him in his sleepless nights.

programme.title: Bekikang
programme.desc: Bekikang is left and abandoned with a baby boy by friend, Fortunato. He loves and raises the child as his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Tatarin

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Walang Pakiramdam
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a rare congenital disease that makes her incapable of feeling physical and emotional pain meets a man with cleft palate who makes her feel love like she never has before.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Manila's Finest
programme.desc: Manila's Finest is inspired and based on the life and career of retired Western Police District (WPD) Col. Jimmy Tiu, who last served as the Sta. Mesa police station commander of WPD.

programme.title: Obsesyon
programme.desc: Screen nymphet Rita Magdalena stars as the object of man’s obsession in this daring movie about a love that knows no bounds and recognizes no rules.

programme.title: Room 213
programme.desc: The story follows the endangered relationship of an architect and his wife, a photographer. After being married for 10 years, they have lost all emotional connections with each other.

programme.title: Steal
programme.desc: When money is involved, trust is a big word. Four Filipinas based in Japan will learn the hard truth about money and trust as they get entangled in their own schemes.

programme.title: Apat Dapat, Dapat Apat
programme.desc: Four women who swear to be friends forever, become domestic helpers when they go over to another country.

programme.title: Bakit Lahat ng Gwapo May Boyfriend?
programme.desc: Kylie (Anne Curtis), a wedding planner has had a long string of boyfriends. Unfortunately for her, they've all been gay.

programme.desc: Lisa has her own take on beach day, as she heads to Huntington Beach. Darrell spends the right amount of time going through his locker. Kenny rides a recent string of luck right into his unit.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Relics from the crucifixion of Jesus Christ have fascinated the faithful for 2000 years—from the wooden cross and iron nails to the crown of thorns. But do these sacred artefacts still exist?

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Mike and Dave go wild for a former Minnesota car dealership that's now home to scores of dusty projects and a one-of-a-kind miniature cruise ship.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: A shift in weather tests the strength of the survivalists' shelters as well as their resolve. Unable to exit their shelters, one survivalist carves out ways to pass the time as another struggles to cope.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Things go nuclear when a Japanese Godzilla toy hits the counter. Can Corey come out on top before he's crushed? Chum does battle over a leather jacket from WWII, but will his offer bomb?

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Relics from the crucifixion of Jesus Christ have fascinated the faithful for 2000 years—from the wooden cross and iron nails to the crown of thorns. But do these sacred artefacts still exist?

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: There's no horsing around when a statue made of turquoise moseys on in. Will it be a yay, or a neigh for Rick? Then, Chum spins over to LA to have a record collection appraised.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: The big guns come out in Riverside, but Rene isn't having any of it. Darrell presses his luck with a smaller locker and makes a neat profit. Dusty finds that once he gets going, it's hard to stop...

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From clandestine nuclear weapons programmes to a secret Cold War bunker hidden in the mountains, we explore the unlikely people and surprising places behind the discoveries of the top-secret information.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: Are modern-day pirates prowling the Bermuda Triangle in search of victims? The team takes on the twisted case of a missing boat called the Saba Bank lost in the vicinity of the Bermuda Triangle in 1974.

programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten mysterious devices, from strange, grooved discs found in a cave in China to an ancient Greek computer to an incredible crystal skull unearthed in Mexico.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Bala Ko Ang Hahatol
programme.desc: Gino (Robin Padilla) kills Rudy (Rey PJ Abellana) and brings Rudy's wife Cristina (Nina Sara) to his boss. Still not in her right mind, Cristina re-enacts her traumatic experience and kills the man in the process.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: A German playwright finds inspiration in a piano that survived the atomic bombing and its owner, who died after the blast at the age of 19, to create a piece warning against war's impact on the young.

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: A Hiroshima teen and an atomic bomb survivor try to depict visually what one mother endured immediately after the blast - her agony, sacrifice, and love - so that her tragic story is not repeated.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 155
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 155
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Practical Picnic
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining and alfresco's a gogo Adam and guests, award-winning chef Somer Sivrioglu and one of Australia's most popular digital creators Daen Lia, have a practical picnic.

programme.title: Australian Story - Gut Instinct - Jane Dudley
programme.desc: When Jane Dudley used an unapproved and icky treatment to cure her crippling depression, it grabbed the attention of the medical world, paving the way for large-scale clinical trials.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Fire - Fire
programme.desc: Blazes fuelled by wind, dry bush and weather can consume everything in their path. Aaron Pedersen explains how nowhere on Earth burns with quite the same intensity and ferocity as Australia - or as regularly.

programme.title: Dr Ann's Secret Lives - Orangutans
programme.desc: Dr Ann Jones ventures into the heart of Borneo's jungle to look for wild orangutan, following a team of dedicated scientists whose work is leading to new insights into one of the world's most intelligent & elusive great apes.

programme.title: Dr Karl's How Things Work - Ginger Beer
programme.desc: Dr Karl takes a peek inside the Bundaberg Ginger Beer Master Brewery. From the ginger farm to the packing line, he examines how this iconic soft drink - made from a spice and then fermented - is produced.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 137
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.desc: Dr Karl takes a peek inside the Bundaberg Ginger Beer Master Brewery. From the ginger farm to the packing line, he examines how this iconic soft drink - made from a spice and then fermented - is produced.

programme.title: Australian Story - Gut Instinct - Jane Dudley
programme.desc: When Jane Dudley used an unapproved and icky treatment to cure her crippling depression, it grabbed the attention of the medical world, paving the way for large-scale clinical trials.

programme.title: The World - Episode 122
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Johnson Raela presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 156
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, overnight developments and interviews plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Stephanie Ferrier with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 156
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs
programme.desc: A scientist tries to solve world hunger only to see things go awry as food falls from the sky in abundance.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: After the death of his brother, an expert street dancer goes to Georgia to attend Truth University. But his efforts to get an education and woo the girl he likes are sidelined when he joins in his fraternity's effort to win a step dancing competition.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: Charlotte Murray Pace, an LSU graduate, is found raped and stabbed to death in her home. The brutality of the crime scene reminds police of the unsolved case of Gina Wilson Green.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 19th December 1995, 19-year-old French hitch-hiker Celine Figard goes missing. Following an appeal, her body is discovered having been raped and bludgeoned to death.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predator's bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: Maine is brought to its knees when its most popular teen turns up dead. With the help of a dedicated mother and a community that never forgets, the secret killer is finally exposed.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When an off-duty Dallas police officer shoots a man in his own apartment, the jury will have to decide if it was murder or a tragic mistake. Amber Guyger takes the stand in her own defense.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When railroad mechanic Robert Limon is shot and killed by Jonathan Hearn, an investigation leads to Robert's widow — and spurs questions about her involvement in the crime.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Scott Perala takes down a career criminal, while FBI Agent, Robert Wittman, investigates a man pretending to be a sheikh selling fake artwork.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: Anatomy Of A Crime
programme.desc: The discovery of a female torso packed in a cardboard box leads Singapore police to a love affair gone wrong.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In June 1985, a 20-year-old 'Sucker Day' Festival Queen is found brutalised. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is in the hands of a local wealthy businessman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A heated argument turns terrifying as a woman is threatened by her boyfriend. Waiting at a gas station after calling 911, she grabs a machete to defend herself.

programme.title: Surviving R. Kelly Part III: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Aaliyah, Jane Doe #1, becomes the cornerstone of the New York Federal trial. A new survivor comes forward after nearly 30 years of remaining quiet.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: Authorities question a woman who travelled with serial killer about whether she was a victim or an accomplice. Plus, a bone-chilling confession from a man who freely admits to killing a college student.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a Florida tourist decides to take a scenic car drive through the ocean; a fugitive fleeing from police hides in plain sight; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A suspect flees from a high-speed car chase while carrying her infant child. State troopers catch a man with a stolen utility pole strapped to the roof of his car.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple — madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: On his last day as an undercover agent, Bergen County Detective Carlos James experiences his first shootout, and ATF Agent Jenn Eskew poses as a hitwoman to investigate a possible murder for hire.

programme.title: En Vadrouille
programme.desc: Accompanied by rugby player Sebastien Chabal, Loïc Ballet searches for the most original homes in Auvergne Rhone-Alpes. After the strange ''chaos house,'' they discover an extraordinary convent, inhabited by a community of brothers and built by Le Corbusier.

programme.title: Serieux ?
programme.desc: With Louise Henault-ethier, Marie-eve helps the Renaud family become more environmentally-friendly, one step at a time. Mathieu meets a chef-mixologist advising us on what to drink and what to choose to consume local and 100% Quebecker.

programme.title: Einstein
programme.desc: Discovery of the Swiss scientific world! Due to their accessible approach, even the most complicated scientific topics and techniques become easy to understand and appealing.

programme.title: Ballake Sissoko, Une Histoire De Kora
programme.desc: Virtuoso player of the kora, emblem of Mandingue culture, the Malian Ballake Sissoko takes us on a unique voyage in search of the origins and development of this twenty-one string harp. Between tradition and innovation, an epic musical journey across the great plains of West Africa.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette
programme.desc: On the menu: fresh tagliatelle with nettles. Discovery of the day: Notes de feve, a 100% traditional chocolate factory.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Einstein
programme.desc: Discovery of the Swiss scientific world! Due to their accessible approach, even the most complicated scientific topics and techniques become easy to understand and appealing.

programme.title: En Vadrouille
programme.desc: Accompanied by rugby player Sebastien Chabal, Loïc Ballet searches for the most original homes in Auvergne Rhone-Alpes. After the strange ''chaos house,'' they discover an extraordinary convent, inhabited by a community of brothers and built by Le Corbusier.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
